mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow WHERE following_id=#{userId}) AS followerCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow WHERE follower_id=#{userId}) AS followingCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM country_visit WHERE user_id=#{userId}) AS countryVisitCount FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT c.id, c.name, cf.country_rank FROM country_fav cf JOIN country c on cf.country_id = c.id WHERE cf.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY cf.country_rank ASC
SELECT lu.id, l.name, lu.proficiency FROM language_user lu JOIN language l on l.id = lu.language_id WHERE lu.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO language_user (user_id, language_id, proficiency) VALUES (#{userId}, #{languageId}, #{proficiency})
